role_definition: Perform scheduled and ad-hoc performance analysis on a customer's investment portfolio. This can include different types of analysis and performance comparisons
example_of_use: A relationship manager requests an investment portfolio performance analysis prior to a regular client meeting
executive_summary: Assess and report on investment portfolio make-up, valuation and performance
key_features: Consolidate investment portfolio transaction details and comparative market activity reports
Select types of performance analysis and apply analyses to the period of transaction data
Develop portfolio performance comparisons and evaluations/justifications
